briefTitle: Fixed Dose Combination of Bisoprolol and Amlodipine in the Treatment of Hypertension
officialTitle: A Randomized, Comparative Trial of Concor AM, a Fixed Dose Combination of Bisoprolol and Amlodipine, on the Treatment of Essential Hypertensive Patients Whose Blood Pressure is Not Well Controlled by Monotherapy of Bisoprolol 5mg or Amlodipine 5mg
summary: This is a randomized, comparative Phase 3 trial to investigate the efficacy of fixed dose combination (FDC) of bisoprolol and amlodipine in hypertensive subjects (superiority of FDC over monotherapies).

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Reduction In Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) After 18 Weeks of Treatment From Baseline
